attributes.action: A National Lockdown for 2-8 weeks, Rather than using the failing Tier system.
attributes.additional_details: As the Tier system is proving to be tedious and is just prolonging the torture and damage amongst the british populations well being, businesses and the economy; alongside creating more room for the virus to spread due to travel and social gathering rules being illogical in terms of prevention.
attributes.background:
Put the nation under National Lockdown for 2-8 weeks, removing stress from the NHS and allowing people to get the vaccine systematically; starting from higher risk counties to the lower risk ones.
2 weeks minimum due to normal self isolation rules.

rejection.details:
On 4th January, the Government announced that a national lockdown would come into force in England from 6th January. See:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home
